document_data.name: the Illuminated
document_data.mainbody: The '''Illuminated''' were located in the [[City of Brass]] on the [[Elemental Plane of Fire]].
document_data.Organization: [[Umar al-Hadra al-Bazan]] led the 50,000 soldiers of the Illuminated.
document_data.Activities: The Illuminated served as constables for the City of Brass, patrolling the city and enforcing curfews.
document_data.Base of Operations: The City of Brass served as the base of the Illuminated.
